nodes.text: Core Craft was a company that worked as the main contractor and supplier for the Sarlacc Project, a secret project that was implemented by the Galactic Empire in about 17 BBY, to construct a prototype Super Star Destroyer. Core Craft helped with the construction of Imeici Spire, a skyscraper in the CoCo Town district of the planet Coruscant that served as the headquarters of the Sarlacc Project. A number of materials designated for use in the construction of Imeici Spire were stored in Core Craft Staging Area 70, the 70th floor of a Core Craft skyscraper warehouse that was located on the edge of CoCo Town.
